text: Dera Ismail Khan Tehsil is an administrative subdivision (tehsil) of Dera Ismail Khan District in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan. ==Administration== The tehsil is administratively divided into 21 Union Councils, four of which form the headquarters - Dera Ismail Khan. Category:Tehsils of Dera Ismail Khan District
title: Dera Ismail Khan Tehsil
